title: My Room Has Become a Dungeon’s Rest Area (WN) - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Apartment Life   Aristocracy   Demi-Humans   Dungeons   Elves   Game Elements   Gate to Another World   Knights   Level System   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Sword And Magic   Technological Gap
author: Tougoku Fudou   東国不動
description: 2LDK apartment in the Tokyo metropolitan area, for rent with only 30.000 Yen. Crap! I have been lured by the cheap price and made a contract to live in the property. Yeah, as expected it was a shitty property. No Ghost came out but a Slime and a Goblin…. also a Female Knight came out. Although I just want to start a peaceful life alone. A Female Knight, a Mage, and a Thief frequented my room. Dungeons are a dangerous place to conquer by those girls. I spread traps made by the items that were bought from a discount store.>
